entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Percé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-d'Espoir 12:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -13.5°C
Wind: N 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow at times heavy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
